ternary relation extraction.from sentence: For ternary relation extraction ( first two columns in ) , our AGGCN model achieves accuracies of 87.1 and 87.0 on instances within single sentence ( Single ) and on all instances ( Cross ) , respectively , which outperform all the baselines .

binary relation extraction.from sentence: For binary relation extraction ( third and fourth columns in ) , AGGCN consistently outperforms GS GLSTM and GCN as well .

AG - GCN model.from sentence: More specifically , our AG - GCN model surpasses the state - of - the - art Graphstructured LSTM model ( GS GLSTM ) by 6.8 and 3.8 points for the Single and Cross settings , respectively .

AGGCN.from sentence: AGGCN also performs better than GCNs , although its performance can be boosted via pruned trees .

our AGGCN model.from sentence: However , our AGGCN model still obtains 8.0 and 5.7 points higher than the GS GLSTM model for ternary and binary relations , respectively .

achieves.from sentence: We also notice that our AGGCN achieves a better test accuracy than all GCN models , which further demonstrates its ability to learn better representations from full trees .

C - AGGCN model.from sentence: Our C - AGGCN model achieves an F1 score of 68.2 , which outperforms the state - ofart C - GCN model by 1.8 points .

performance gap.from sentence: The performance gap between GCNs with pruned trees and AGGCNs with full trees empirically show that the AGGCN model is better at distinguishing relevant from irrelevant information for learning a better graph representation .

GCN models.from sentence: Compared to GCN models , our model obtains 1.3 and 1.2 points higher than the best performing model with pruned tree ( K=1 ) .

AGGCN and C - AGGCN.from sentence: We also notice that AGGCN and C - AGGCN achieve better precision and recall scores than GCN and C - GCN , respectively .

SemEval dataset.from sentence:
We also evaluate our model on the SemEval dataset under the same settings as .
Our C - AGGCN model ( 85.7 ) consistently outperforms the C - GCN model ( 84.8 ) , showing the good generalizability .
